name: Yamada Ryosuke, Yama-chan Masquerade Boy (X-kit)
description:
A TUMBLR theme featuring Yamada Ryosuke, Yama-chan from Hey! Say! JUMP's Masquerade song/video. This version features a boy icon for user's home button, the same version with a girl icon is also available. 

This theme is Xkit compatible.
